verses.verse: The priests <S%H3548><s%> the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Levi, <S%H3878><s%> shall have no <S%H3808><s%> part <S%H2506><s%> nor inheritance <S%H5159><s%> with Israel: <S%H3478><s%> they shall eat <S%H398><s%> the offerings of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> made by fire, and his inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>

Therefore shall they have no <S%H3808><s%> inheritance <S%H5159><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> their brothers: <S%H251><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is their inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> as he has said <S%H1696><s%> to them.

And this <S%H2088><s%> shall be the priest's <S%H3548><s%> due <S%H4941><s%> from the people, <S%H5971><s%> from them that offer <S%H2076><s%> a sacrifice, <S%H2077><s%> whether <S%H518><s%> it be ox <S%H7794><s%> or sheep; <S%H7716><s%> and they shall give <S%H5414><s%> to the priest <S%H3548><s%> the shoulder, <S%H2220><s%> and the two cheeks, <S%H3895><s%> and the maw. <S%H6896><s%>

The first fruit <S%H7225><s%> also of your corn, <S%H1715><s%> of your wine, <S%H8492><s%> and of your oil, <S%H3323><s%> and the first <S%H7225><s%> of the fleece <S%H1488><s%> of your sheep, <S%H6629><s%> shall you give <S%H5414><s%> him.

For the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has chosen <S%H977><s%> him out of all <S%H3605><s%> your tribes, <S%H7626><s%> to stand <S%H5975><s%> to minister <S%H8334><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> him and his sons <S%H1121><s%> for ever. <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%>

And if <S%H3588><s%> a Levite <S%H3881><s%> come <S%H935><s%> from any <S%H259><s%> of your gates <S%H8179><s%> out of all <S%H3605><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> he sojourned, <S%H1481><s%> and come <S%H935><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> the desire <S%H183><s%> of his mind <S%H5315><s%> to the place <S%H4725><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall choose; <S%H977><s%>

Then he shall minister <S%H8334><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> his God, <S%H430><s%> as all <S%H3605><s%> his brothers <S%H251><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> do, which stand <S%H5975><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
They shall have like portions <S%H2506><s%> to eat, <S%H398><s%> beside <S%H905><s%> that which comes of the sale <S%H4465><s%> of his patrimony. <S%H5921><s%> <S%H1><s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> you are come <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you, you shall not learn <S%H3925><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> after the abominations <S%H8441><s%> of those <S%H1992><s%> nations. <S%H1471><s%>

There shall not be found <S%H4672><s%> among you any one that makes his son <S%H1121><s%> or his daughter <S%H1323><s%> to pass <S%H5674><s%> through the fire, <S%H784><s%> or that uses divination, <S%H7081><s%> or an observer <S%H6049><s%> of times, or an enchanter, <S%H5172><s%> or a witch. <S%H3784><s%>
Or a charmer, <S%H2266><s%> <S%H2267><s%> or a consulter <S%H7592><s%> with familiar spirits, <S%H178><s%> or a wizard, <S%H3049><s%> or a necromancer. <S%H1875><s%> <S%H4191><s%>

For all <S%H3605><s%> that do <S%H6213><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things are an abomination <S%H8441><s%> to the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> and because <S%H1558><s%> of these <S%H428><s%> abominations <S%H8441><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> does drive <S%H3423><s%> them out from before <S%H6440><s%> you.
You shall be perfect <S%H8549><s%> with the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>

For these <S%H428><s%> nations, <S%H1471><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you shall possess, <S%H3423><s%> listened <S%H8085><s%> to observers <S%H6049><s%> of times, and to diviners: <S%H7080><s%> but as for you, the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has not suffered <S%H5414><s%> you so <S%H3651><s%> to do.

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will raise <S%H6965><s%> up to you a Prophet <S%H5030><s%> from the middle <S%H7130><s%> of you, of your brothers, <S%H251><s%> like <S%H3644><s%> to me; to him you shall listen; <S%H8085><s%>

According to all <S%H3605><s%> that you desired <S%H7592><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> in Horeb <S%H2722><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of the assembly, <S%H6951><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Let me not hear <S%H8085><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> my God, <S%H430><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> let me see <S%H7200><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> any more, <S%H5750><s%> that I die <S%H4191><s%> not.
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, They have well <S%H3190><s%> spoken that which <S%H834><s%> they have spoken. <S%H1696><s%>

I will raise <S%H6965><s%> them up a Prophet <S%H5030><s%> from among <S%H7130><s%> their brothers, <S%H251><s%> like <S%H3644><s%> to you, and will put <S%H5414><s%> my words <S%H1697><s%> in his mouth; <S%H6310><s%> and he shall speak <S%H1696><s%> to them all <S%H3605><s%> that I shall command <S%H6680><s%> him.

And it shall come <S%H1961><s%> to pass, that whoever <S%H376><s%> <S%H834><s%> will not listen <S%H8085><s%> to my words <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he shall speak <S%H1696><s%> in my name, <S%H8034><s%> I will require <S%H1875><s%> it of him.

But the prophet, <S%H5030><s%> which <S%H834><s%> shall presume <S%H2102><s%> to speak <S%H1696><s%> a word <S%H1697><s%> in my name, <S%H8034><s%> which I have not commanded <S%H6680><s%> him to speak, <S%H1696><s%> or that shall speak <S%H1696><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of other <S%H312><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%> even that prophet <S%H5030><s%> shall die. <S%H4191><s%>

And if <S%H3588><s%> you say <S%H559><s%> in your heart, <S%H3824><s%> How <S%H349><s%> shall we know <S%H3045><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has not spoken? <S%H1696><s%>

When <S%H834><s%> a prophet <S%H5030><s%> speaks <S%H1696><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> if the thing <S%H1697><s%> follow <S%H1961><s%> not, nor <S%H3808><s%> come <S%H935><s%> to pass, that is the thing <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has not spoken, <S%H1696><s%> but the prophet <S%H5030><s%> has spoken <S%H1696><s%> it presumptuously: <S%H2087><s%> you shall not be afraid <S%H1481><s%> of him.
